titleStmt.title: The interest of Scotland in three essays ...
titleStmt.author: Seton, William, Sir, d. 1744.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to William Seton. cf. BM.
Of the true original and indifferency of church government -- Of the union of Scotland and England into one monarchy -- Of the present state of Scotland.
